channel.title: Passing Bablok on Lab & Data Science

item.title: Deming and Passing-Bablok Regressions
item.description: Deming and Passing-Bablok regressions are used to compare two quantitative methods. They are used to compare a reference method to the new method. Depending on the data structure, one of these two regression methods is used a part of a validation study. Deming and Passing-Bablok regressions are variations of an ordinary-least-squares (OLS) linear regression. In this post we will discuss Deming and Passing-Bablok regressions. Before we get there however, we will first touch on OLS regression.
